FuncDef:
The mpls l2vpn pw performance disable command disables the function of PW performance information collection .
The undo mpls l2vpn pw performance disable command restores the default setting.
By default, the function of PW performance information collection is enabled .
CLIs: undo mpls l2vpn pw performance disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a PW is configured on an interface, the function to collect PW performance statistics is automatically enabled on the interface. If other performance statistics collection methods are available or you want to further improve system performance, you can run the mpls l2vpn pw performance disable command to disable the function to collect PW performance statistics.
Prerequisites
These commands need to be associated with a PW. These commands can be configured on an interface only after a PW has been configured on the interface.
These commands apply only to static and dynamic LDP PWs.
Precautions
The mpls l2vpn pw performance disable and undo mpls l2vpn pw performance disable commands apply only to primary PWs.
